_cert_file_comment: Path to a valid certificate file
_key_file_comment: Path to a valid private key file
_use_auth: Enable JWT authorization. Please enable for deployment

jwt._admin: Admin has access to all APIs
jwt._user: User only has access to /volumes endpoint

_backup_db_to_kube_secret: Backup the heketi database to a Kubernetes secret when running in Kubernetes. Default is off.
_profiling: Enable go/pprof profiling on the /debug/pprof endpoints.

_executor_comment: Execute plugin. Possible choices: mock, ssh
mock: This setting is used for testing and development.
It will not send commands to any node.
ssh:  This setting will notify Heketi to ssh to the nodes.
It will need the values in sshexec to be configured.
kubernetes: Communicate with GlusterFS containers over
glusterfs._sshexec_comment: SSH username and private key file information

sshexec.fstab: Optional: Specify fstab file on node.  Default is /etc/fstab
sshexec.pv_data_alignment: Optional: Specify PV data alignment size. Default is 256K
sshexec.vg_physicalextentsize: Optional: Specify VG physical extent size. Default is 4MB
sshexec.lv_chunksize: Optional: Specify LV chunksize. Default is 256K
sshexec.xfs_sw: Optional: Specify number of data disks in the underlying RAID device
sshexec.xfs_su: Optional: Specifies a stripe unit or RAID chunk size.
sshexec.gluster_cli_timeout: Optional: Timeout, in seconds, passed to the gluster cli invocations
sshexec._debug_umount_failures: Optional: boolean to capture more details in case brick unmounting fails

kubeexec.fstab: Optional: Specify fstab file on node.  Default is /etc/fstab
kubeexec.pv_data_alignment: Optional: Specify PV data alignment size. Default is 256K
kubeexec.vg_physicalextentsize: Optional: Specify VG physical extent size. Default is 4MB
kubeexec.lv_chunksize: Optional: Specify LV chunksize. Default is 256K
kubeexec.xfs_sw: Optional: Specify number of data disks in the underlying RAID device.
kubeexec.xfs_su: Optional: Specifies a stripe unit or RAID chunk size.
kubeexec.gluster_cli_timeout: Optional: Timeout, in seconds, passed to the gluster cli invocations
kubeexec._debug_umount_failures: Optional: boolean to capture more details in case brick unmounting fails

glusterfs._refresh_time_monitor_gluster_nodes: Refresh time in seconds to monitor Gluster nodes
glusterfs._start_time_monitor_gluster_nodes: Start time in seconds to monitor Gluster nodes when the heketi comes up
_loglevel_comment: none, critical, error, warning, info, debug
glusterfs._auto_create_block_hosting_volume: Creates Block Hosting volumes automatically if not found or exsisting volume exhausted
glusterfs._block_hosting_volume_size: New block hosting volume will be created in size mentioned, This is considered only if auto-create is enabled.
glusterfs._block_hosting_volume_options: New block hosting volume will be created with the following set of options. Removing the group gluster-block option is NOT recommended. Additional options can be added next to it separated by a comma.
glusterfs._pre_request_volume_options: Volume options that will be applied for all volumes created. Can be overridden by volume options in volume create request.
glusterfs._post_request_volume_options: Volume options that will be applied for all volumes created. To be used to override volume options in volume create request.
